    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:5a629ad4-49d5-4f51-a212-f6f268bd2981</entry>

            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>5a629ad4-49d5-4f51-a212-f6f268bd2981</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Mondatstilisztika</string>
            <string language="en-US">Statement Stylistics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisung-Stilistik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Stylistique de Rapport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Stylistics Da Indicação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stilistica Di Istruzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Stylistics δήλωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estilística De la Declaración</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A mondatok stílushatásának kialakulása, a stílust befolyásoló tényezők; a szóképek és alakzatok szerepe a mondatban</string>
            <string language="en-US">Development of Style Effect of Sentence, Aspects Influencing Style; Role of Word Images and Formations in the Sentence</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">szintaxis</string>
            <string language="en-US">syntax</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwicklung des Art-Effektes des Programmsatzes, 
Aspekte, die Art beeinflussen; Rolle der Wort-Bilder und der 
Anordnungen im Programmsatz</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Développement d'effet de modèle de phrase, 
aspects influençant le modèle ; Rôle des images et des 
formations de mot dans la phrase</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenvolvimento do efeito do estilo da sentença, 
aspectos que influenciam o estilo; Papel de imagens e de 
formações da palavra na sentença</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sviluppo di effetto di stile della frase, funzioni
che influenzano stile; Ruolo delle immagini e delle formazioni 
di parola nella frase</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάπτυξη της επίδρασης ύφους της πρότασης, πτυχές που
επηρεάζει το ύφος  Ρόλος των εικόνων και των σχηματισμών 
του Word στην πρόταση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desarrollo del efecto del estilo de la sentencia, 
aspectos que influencian estilo; Papel de las imágenes y de las
formaciones de la palabra en la sentencia</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Syntax</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">syntaxe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sintaxe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sintassi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύνταξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sintaxis</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
